comments: Reads off a script the entire time, sometimes almost word for word. you will get nothing out of his powerpoints, and very hard to follow. Good luck staying awake! He did not grade anything of mine, all TA and TA graded much harder than the actual professor... thank you Jim Fox...

Paces back and forth while teaching reading directly from his little sheet of paper. Not of much help when it comes to learning and his powerpoints are useless at best. His train of thought during his lecture is quite ridiculous and it doesn\'t seem like he knows what he is talking about.
